name: Overdrive (itch) (CptBlackPixel)
description:
Join a friend or play alone to manage a chaotic car workshop.

Fix car as they arrive using different tools, but don't be lazy, if you take too long to fix the issues the customers will not be happy.

Controls

 Player 1

  • Movements: WASD / Run: H
  • Use tools: T
  • Hold objects: G

Player 2

  • Movements: arrows / Run: K
  • Use tools: ;
  • Hold objects: L

You need to fix the flat tires of the car (the red ones).

  • Grab the automatic screwdriver
  • Remove the flat tire
  • Put the tire on the workbench
  • Fix the tire by activating it
  • Grab the tire 
  • Place it near its place on the car
  • Use the screwdriver again to attach the tire again
